channel.title: GPS module object for generative music
channel.description:
I have a friend (really this one is not me) who is excited about the prospect of building a GPS-based, procedural, generative music synth so that different places have a different sound.
This is surely technically possible, but does anyone know what it would take to get a GPS module into an Axoloti object?

item.title: GPS module object for generative music
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaACNewman Joshua A.C. Newman
item.description:
@JoshuaACNewman wrote:

Oh! Good point! Then send MIDI from the Arduino!

Read full topic
item.source: GPS module object for generative music

item.title: GPS module object for generative music
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

probably an arduino and a gps module would be the easiest solution. otherwise gps to uart of axoloti should also be possible.

Read full topic
